pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Django Tiers[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/appsembler/django-tiers.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/appsembler/django-tiers)[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/appsembler/django-tiers/branch/master/graph/badge.svg)](https://codecov.io/gh/appsembler/django-tiers)This should serve as a reusable django app for representing tiers. Currently it only implements the"Trial" tier but it should be easily extendable.## InstallAdd `tiers` to `INSTALLED_APPS`.Set `TIERS_EXPIRED_REDIRECT_URL` and `TIERS_ORGANIZATION_MODEL` in settings. Run `manage.py migrate`.Add `tiers.middleware.TierMiddleware` to MIDDLEWARE in settings.py.You might want to add it at the top.## Testing mkvirtualenv django-tiers make install-dev make install-test-deps py.test
